title: What happens when Hesiod meets Jesus?
description:
Here's are some of my thoughts on the prologue (if you can call it that) to Hesiod's Theogony. To what extent is Hesiod talking about Jesus Christ? What is the role of truth in Christian salvation? What is the relationship between dancing and singing? This prologue is very tightly packed when reading it as a Christian. I barely scratched the surface.

This is episode 35 of my podcast.

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
